posts.raw_content:
Almost the whole of government seems like a gigantic looting operation. The little fish are stealing almost directly like the LA county executive who got a $2MM settlement for having to become an elected official. Medium sized fish like LA Mayor Bass have got some larger scam (there's $2 billion in homeless spending that can't be accounted for) The big fish have more complicated schemes, cough Slava Ukraine. 

On one hand you get the government you deserve. On the other, I can't help but think we lost our way somehow. 

We need to take a step back and figure out how we got here. How did we go from a consensus government that largely worked to a uniparty that treats us like tax cattle to be milked or slaughtered depending on market conditions?

Were we really subverted by communists? Or were we immunocompromised and that made us vulnerable.

What changed in America and can we change it back?

I think, and maybe I'm wrong, but I think it's because we allowed ourselves to be led away from God. I'm not sure how it happened. There are the obvious tiny hat scapegoats/villains, but I don't think othering the blame will lead us back to the promised land. When the Israelites went astray it was not the Pharoh who led them there. 

I don't think blaming the boomers is the answer either. Ultimately, we need to look at ourselves.  What we did today and whether we walked the narrow path and whether we called others to follow the way.
posts.author: SuperDuperBasedMD
posts.title: Finding our way
posts.content:
Almost the whole of government seems like a gigantic looting operation. The little fish are stealing almost directly like the LA county executive who got a $2MM settlement for having to become an elected official. Medium sized fish like LA Mayor Bass have got some larger scam (there's $2 billion in homeless spending that can't be accounted for) The big fish have more complicated schemes, cough Slava Ukraine.

On one hand you get the government you deserve. On the other, I can't help but think we lost our way somehow.

We need to take a step back and figure out how we got here. How did we go from a consensus government that largely worked to a uniparty that treats us like tax cattle to be milked or slaughtered depending on market conditions?

Were we really subverted by communists? Or were we immunocompromised and that made us vulnerable.

What changed in America and can we change it back?

I think, and maybe I'm wrong, but I think it's because we allowed ourselves to be led away from God. I'm not sure how it happened. There are the obvious tiny hat scapegoats/villains, but I don't think othering the blame will lead us back to the promised land. When the Israelites went astray it was not the Pharoh who led them there.

I don't think blaming the boomers is the answer either. Ultimately, we need to look at ourselves. What we did today and whether we walked the narrow path and whether we called others to follow the way.
